RG28XX:
button=joystick=keycode=keyname

A=0=1B=Escape
B=1=0D=Return
X=3=400000E4=Right Ctrl
Y=2=20=Space

Up=N/A
Down=N/A
Left=N/A
Right=N/A

SE=6=40000051=Down
ST=7=40000050=Left
M=8/11=40000052/61=Up/A
Power=N/A=40000066=Power

L1(LL)=4=6F=O
L2(LR)=9=4000004F=Right
R1(RR)=5=73=S
R2(RL)=10=30=0

VolumnUp=14=0x40000080=VolumnUp
VolumnDown=13=0x40000081=VolumnDown
